mapper.select: SELECT yop.yixkh_operation_id AS operationId, CONVERT ( VARCHAR (20), yop.operate_time, 20 ) AS TIME, yop.operator_id AS operatorBy, yop.operate_dec AS status, yop.operate_remark as remark FROM dbo.tb_sal_yixkh_operation yop INNER JOIN dbo.tb_sys_record_keh kh ON kh.kehID = yop.operator_id WHERE 1=1 and operate_type = 'UpdateOrderProgress' AND yop.operator_id = #{operatorById} AND yop.yixkh_orderId = #{salesLeadsOrderId} ORDER BY operate_time asc

SELECT yop.yixkh_operation_id AS operateId, yop.operate_remark AS operatorRemark, yop.yixkh_orderId AS salesLeadsOrder, yop.operate_dec AS operationType, yo.fail_reason AS failReasons FROM dbo.tb_sal_yixkh_operation yop LEFT JOIN dbo.tb_sal_yixkh_orders yo ON yo.yixkhOrderId = yop.yixkh_orderId WHERE yop.yixkh_operation_id = #{id}
